org.apache.mesos.executor

Class ProcessTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mesos.executor.ProcessTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ExecutorTask
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProcessTaskTest.FailingProcessTask

    public class ProcessTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecutorTask
    Generic process task, that can be spawned using CustomExecutor.
